inclusion.criterion: Unstable angina or non-ST elevation myocardial infarction
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stabilised symptoms without recurrent chest pain or IV therapy for 12 hrs when ambulant.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refractory ischaemia (i.e. recurrent angina with minimal exertion or at rest (i.e. Canadian Cardiovascular Society class III or IV) not controlled by medical therapy)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and HA, denies CP/SOB. No sensory or motor defects.
